title: Applet 1 - Basic Events
description: Explore the fundamentals of DOM events through interactive examples and exercises.

title: Applet 2 - Leaflet Map
description: Create and customize interactive maps using the Leaflet library, integrating various mapping features.

title: Applet 3 - Event Button Logger
description: Capture and log events triggered by button interactions to understand event handling in web applications.

title: Applet 4 - Dynamic Elements
description: Learn to manipulate the DOM by dynamically adding and removing elements based on user input.

title: Applet 5 - Openweather API
description: Fetch and display weather data using the Openweather API to create a functional weather application.

title: Applet 6 - Todo List
description: Manage your tasks efficiently with this interactive to-do list, allowing users to add, edit, and delete items.
